message:
@slack-incidents-emp-lifecycle,@slack-incidents-jobs

`next::employer::selfservice::subscriptioncontroller_index` p90 latency is too high.

The Subscription page is taking too long to respond.

See/edit next steps here: https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/2668101914/Common+Errors+-+Runbooks+and+Next+Steps
name: Resource next::employer::selfservice::subscriptioncontroller_index has a high p90 latency on env:production
